opendial.modules

Class WizardLearner

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.modules.WizardLearner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Module

    public class WizardLearner
extends java.lang.Object
implements Module
    Module employed to update parameters when provided with gold-standard actions from Wizard-of-Oz data.
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-03-13 21:38:32 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
